cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.instructions: Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass.

cocktails.name: Martini
cocktails.instructions: Stir the gin and vermouth together with ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive or a twist of lemon zest.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a large cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the sugar cube with a few dashes of water. Add the bitters, whiskey, and ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with an orange twist and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.instructions: Muddle the mint leaves and sugar with a splash of soda water in a glass. Add ice cubes and the rum, then top with soda water. Garnish with a sprig of mint leaves and a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Pina Colada
cocktails.instructions: Blend all the ingredients with ice in a electric blender, pour into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.instructions: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

cocktails.name: Caipirinha
cocktails.instructions: Muddle lime and sugar in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with ice and add the Cachaça.

cocktails.name: Moscow Mule
cocktails.instructions: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a copper mug filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir gently and garnish with a lime slice.

cocktails.name: Sex on the Beach
cocktails.instructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Long Island Iced Tea
cocktails.instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a glass with ice. Top with a lemon slice.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a whiskey sour glass. Garnish and serve.

cocktails.name: Mai Tai
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish and serve with straw.

cocktails.name: Pisco Sour
cocktails.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled champagne flute.

cocktails.name: Bloody Mary
cocktails.instructions: Stirring gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass. Garnish.

cocktails.name: Espresso Martini
cocktails.instructions: Shake well, strain into a large cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: White Russian
cocktails.instructions: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with light cream and serve.

cocktails.name: Gin and Tonic
cocktails.instructions: Pour the gin and the tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

cocktails.name: Screwdriver
cocktails.instructions: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Garnish and serve.

cocktails.name: Tequila Sunrise
cocktails.instructions: Pour tequila into a highball glass with ice cubes. Add orange juice and stir gently. Garnish with a half-slice of orange.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.instructions: Stirred over ice, strained into a large cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Screwdriver
cocktails.instructions: Pour vodka and orange juice into a highball glass over ice. Add a dash of grenadine, garnish and serve.

cocktails.name: Sidecar
cocktails.instructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Old Pal
cocktails.instructions: Stir well.

cocktails.name: Paloma
cocktails.instructions: Shake together in a cocktail shaker, then strain into the glass over crushed ice. Serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Tom Collins
cocktails.instructions: Shake juice of lemon with sugar and gin in a mixing glass. Pour over ice cubes in a Collins glass. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktails.name: Gin Fizz
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into glass. Top with soda water.

cocktails.name: Singapore Sling
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into glass. Top with soda water.
